## hpr1552 :: An Open Source News Break from Opensource.com

 In this episode: An interview with Mark Johnson of OSS Watch, the Open Source Seed Initiative, and a video game that asks to be hacked.
Links:

https://opensource.com/community/14/5/community-spotlight-mark-johnson-osswatch
https://opensource.com/law/14/5/legal-issues-open-source-seed-initiative
https://opensource.com/life/14/5/hack-n-slash
